short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the tooltip from the image below the comic

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Did you know that SMBC has a mouse-over tooltip? I definitely do, but I keep forgetting to check it. Most of the time, it's just the date, but recently Zach Weinersmith has been adding in tooltips that are sometimes even funnier than the comic itself.

This thingamabob puts in the tooltip underneath the comic so you can never forget to check it again!
